## Engine.computeEngineAddress() method

 Statically computes an Engine address

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
static computeEngineAddress(factory: string, risky: string, stable: string, contractBytecode: string): string;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  factory | string | Deployer of the Engine contract |
|  risky | string | Risky token |
|  stable | string | Stable token |
|  contractBytecode | string | Bytecode of the PrimitiveEngine.sol smart contract |

<b>Returns:</b>

string

engine address
